title: Severe recession, increased G has biggest impact

content.question: If the economy is in a severe recession, which of the following is the fiscal policy most effective in stimulating production?

choices.label: The Federal Reserve sells bonds on the open market.
The Federal Reserve buys bonds on the open market.
